repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The Manuscript folio are reverse in order. Last folio at the beginning and the initial folio is at the end. Blank folio after the last folio has some lines in the left corner. The text goes like line 1 aśiṣyemiyaṃ vi? line 2 vāgaṃsumantrarā line 3 yadāneyo line 4 saundaryamāsyāyāṃ ... Title on the guard folio: Advaitaparibhāṣā. After the guard folio 3 folio with some matter written. x-1 śatadhāniṣādasthapatiṃ yājayedityatra karmadhāraya parigṛhet x-5 niṣādadasyācśabdasāmarthyāt iti sūtraṃ ayam ṣaṣṭhisamāsapakṣe niṣādasaṃbandhavi after this one balnk folio and then one folio with some text followed with a blank folio and the text of Avaitaparibhsāṣā begins.

msItem.title: Advaitaparibhāṣā
msItem.author: Dharmmarājadhvaridra
msItem.rubric: (1v 1) yad vidyāvilāsen bhūtabhautikasuṣṭayaḥ tannaumi paranātmānaṃ paramāmtānam saccidānandavigrahaṃ . (1v 2) yadantevāsi pañcāsyai 1v 2 rnirastā bhedivāriṇā tannaumi nṛsiṃhākhyaṃ yatīdraṃ paramaṃ gurūṃ 2
msItem.incipit: (2r 1) bini dharmmarājādhvarīndreṇa paribhāṣā vitanyate iha khhalu dharmārthakāmamokṣākhyeṣu caturvidhapuruṣā (2r 2) rtheṣu mokṣa aiva paramapuruṣārthaḥ
msItem.explicit: (52r 3) papadyate . tasmādekāvidyāvidyāpakṣepi pratijīvamāvaraṇabhedopagamena vyavasthipapādanīyā tadevaṃ brahmajñānānmokṣaḥ mokṣaścā (52r 4) narthanivṛttiniratiśayabrahnandāvāptiśceti siddhaṃ prayojanaṃ śrīmate rāmānujāryāya namaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: (52r 4)iti dharmmarājadhvaridraviraci (52r 5) tāyāṃ vedānntaparibhāṣāyāṃ aṣṭamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ samāptā vedāntaparibhāṣā - upalakramopasaṃhārābhyā (52r 6) [sopūrvatāphalārthavādotpatti (ṣaṭ?) tātparyanirṇaye]

support.p: Dark brwon wooden guard folio with scratches and patches.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeratio in the left margin of the folio. 1v-52r
supportDesc.condition: Folio woth wormholes. Margins are broken.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu is written in the left margin on the 1v.

listBibl.bibl: Vedānta-Paribhāṣā of Dharmarāja ādhvarīndra Translated and Annotated by Swami Madhavananda with forward by Dr. S N Dasgupta, Advaita Ashrama Calcutta, 1983 (5th Impression)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) yad vidyāvilāsen bhūtabhautikasuṣṭayaḥ tannaumi paranātmānaṃ paramāmtānam saccidānandavigrahaṃ . yadantevāsi pañcāsyai (1v 2) rnirastā bhedivāriṇā tannaumi nṛsiṃhākhyaṃ yatīdraṃ paramaṃ gurūṃ 2
(2r 1) bini dharmmarājādhvarīndreṇa paribhāṣā vitanyate iha khhalu dharmārthakāmamokṣākhyeṣu caturvidhapuruṣā (2r 2) rtheṣu mokṣa aiva paramapuruṣārthaḥ
(52r 3) papadyate . tasmādekāvidyāvidyāpakṣepi pratijīvamāvaraṇabhedopagamena vyavasthipapādanīyā tadevaṃ brahmajñānānmokṣaḥ mokṣaścā (52r 4) narthanivṛttiniratiśayabrahnandāvāptiśceti siddhaṃ prayojanaṃ śrīmate rāmānujāryāya namaḥ . iti dharmmarājadhvaridraviraci (52r 5) tāyāṃ vedānntaparibhāṣāyāṃ aṣṭamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ samāptā vedāntaparibhāṣā - upalakramopasaṃhārābhyā (52r 6) [sopūrvatāphalārthavādotpatti (ṣaṭ?) tātparyanirṇaye]
